summary: Qantas Airways, or Qantas, is Australia's biggest airline and one of the oldest in the world, founded in 1920. It's known as "The Flying Kangaroo" and serves all seven continents. Qantas operates from major Australian cities to international destinations and over 60 domestic locations. The airline is based in Sydney and is a part of the Oneworld alliance. It also owns Jetstar, a low-cost airline, and has shares in other airlines like Fiji Airways.
title: Qantas
